name: Louis Roederer Champagne Cristal Vinothéque Brut 1996
description: Let me take you with me on the journey through the wonderful world of fine wine. This is Tasting Note No1 by your favourite H=N Sommelier Richie: Louis Roederer Champagne Cristal Vinothéque Brut 1996 - What a beauty that Champaign is. Absolutely astonishing. This wonderful color, this nose and that firework on the palate. Dear lord that’s the kind of champagne I wanna have served at the heavens door. That laser-beam like acidity, cooked apples, brioche, yuzu, cream, biscuit are dancing  all together on my palate. That dance lasts unbelievable long. A true pleasure to drink. For shure one of the top five bubbles I had until now. Find me @dernadler on instagram.
